QuestData.Title: Yakity Yak
QuestData.Description: For now, the yaungol invaders seem content to steal yaks. Surveying the area, however, you notice they could easily move on the Yak Wash at any moment.$b$bThinning their numbers may help show the yaungol that this area is protected.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 9 Burilgi Despoilers at the Muskpaw Ranch.
QuestData.RewardText: Well then, I am mighty grateful for you culling some of those yaungols for us.$b$bHopefully your little display of authority will be enough to discourage them from coming over here.
